body.name: Macally USB C Mouse Wired - Comfortable and Precise - USB Type C Mouse for MacBook Pro/Air, iMac, Mac Mini/Pro, iPad - Plug and Play Apple USBC Mouse with Ambidextrous Body, Multiple DPI
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: (Clean and Simple): Equip your workstation with a reliable usb-c mouse that will improve your workflow with effortless operation, comfortable feel, and simplistic aesthetics.

(Designed for USB C Devices): As Type C ports are now the standard with new gen devices, our corded mouse will work seamlessly as an Android, PC, iPad, or Macbook mouse with those ports. Just plug and play.
(Point and Click Your Way): Whether you prefer high, low, or moderate cursor sensitivity, our mac mouse has adjustable DPI settings (800/1200/1600/2400) so you can fine tune your desired experience.

(Comfort Focused Design): Our usbc mouse is designed with the perfect combination of ergonomics and visual appeal. It incorporates body angles that mold perfectly to the palm of your hands. Perfect as Apple mouse alternative.

(What You Will Recieve): At Macally, your satisfaction is our top priority. Therefore with our wired mouse for Mac, PC, Android, and iOS, you will also recieve lifetime support, up to 2 year warranty, and free returns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I have an iMac. Finding a mouse for it has been a nightmare. The ones I had previously bought said they were iMac compatible weren't. Only worked on iPads & laptops. The ones I found were expensive. Then I stumbled across this one. I really doubted it work but for the price thought I'd give it a try. Well much to my surprise it worked and it worked well!!!! It was easy to install, too! I've had it for a week now and am very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good size, soft click
reviews.reviewText: I like this mouse because it has a good positive click but quiet in volume. It’s a good size for traveling and hard wired for reliability and removing use of batteries.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kind of meh, okay mouse
reviews.reviewText: It works alright with Macbook Pro. The scrolling is smooth with an okay feel for the scroll wheel. The sensor I guess uses infra-red as you see nothing. Making you think at first it isn't on. The DPI options are well chosen. It is too small for average hands. Needs to be a third larger which I did know prior to ordering. It would be ergonomic if it were larger.It feels and seems cheap, like you expect of a $6-7 mouse. Cord is thin and stays coiled up rather than feeding out nicely when you take it out. I was on the fence about sending it back. Some cheap gaming mice for the same money are better, but some don't seem to scroll as well in MacOS as they do in Windows. Wish there were more USB C mice to choose from.In the end since it moves and scrolls a bit better than some mice in MacOS and has USB C I decided to keep it. Hope it lasts longer than it feels like it will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I am a mac person and I have two mac mouses, but for whatever reason, even when charged, turned on and off, all things the way it should be with 'interference' they just crapped out with tracking well. I googled best mice, and this is the one that came up. For the price I figured I had nothing to lose! I LOVE IT! Tracks perfectly - easy to use, yes, it's plugged into my computer but I don't care because it works perfectly all of the time. Love it! It does make a tiny clicking sound when you use it. I don't mind that at all, but mention it, because my son was telling me he like the kind that makes zero sound. I think of it as the sounds of accomplishment;) Happy clicking!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for MacBook Air

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement mouse
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to replace two cordless mice that died on me. Cordless is nice, but this is simple, requires no batteries, and will probably last a very long time. It's comfortable to use and has a good feel to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The mouse works great, when it works. But it periodically stops working. About 3 or 4 times a day I have to unplug it from the Mac and plug it back in to reestablish the connection. I don't know if there is a fix for this. It's not a huge issue, it just takes a couple seconds, but it's a bit annoying. Otherwise it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars McNally usb C mouse
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for my needs . I hated the wireless Apple mouse . Comfortable too

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente calidad, ergonómico para manos pequeñas
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Es un buen mouse básico, idéntico a la imagen, llegó bien empaquetado sin golpes en la caja, su cable es bastante largo, conectó sin problema con mi laptop MacBook air M1.Lo mejor: es silencioso y preciso.Es pequeño, por lo que a mi mano le queda cómodo, pero a otros no será así
Super easy to use. Plug and play. Functions well. I like wired mice and keyboard better than wireless. This one is one of my better buys.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 30, 2021

reviews.reviewTitle: Works like it was intended to.
reviews.reviewText: Runs perfectly. No problems so far.
I find wire mouse to be most reliable and this allows me to fit my mac usb c port without need for added accessory. Thanks!
